item.title: Characteristics Of Human Rights
item.description: Universal Inherent to all of us regardless of sex, nation, caste, ethnicity, creed Inalienable cannot be taken away* (can be temporarily restricted)

item.title: Role of Human Rights in India
item.description: Human rights ensure that everyone has access to - fundamental necessitities Food Shelter To protect minorities Six Fundamental Rights Right to Equality

item.title: Human Rights Intro
item.description: What are Human Rights? Why do we need them? Basic, inalienable rights from birth to death inherent can only be restricted, cannot taken away
